Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
foul-smelling \foul-smelling\ adj. emitting an unpleasasnt odor.
Syn: fetid, foul, funky, noisome, smelly, putrid, stinking. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
foul-smelling adj : offensively malodorous; "a putrid smell" [syn: {fetid}, {foetid}, {foul}, {funky}, {noisome}, {smelly}, {putrid}, {stinking}]
